contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=January 2013}} {{Infobox Software | name = Yojimbo | logo = [[Image:Yojimbo Logo.png|64px]] | screenshot = [[Image:Yojimbo default library.png|300px|The example library.]]<br /><!-- Deleted image removed: [[Image:Yojimbo tab.png|The quick access tab.]] --> | caption = Yojimbo's example library and quick reference tab. | developer = [[Bare Bones Software]] | latest release version = 3.0.2 | latest release date = 2011-03-05 | latest preview version = | latest preview date = | operating system = [[Mac OS X]] | platform = | genre = [[personal information manager]] | license = | website = [http://www.barebones.com/products/yojimbo/ BareBones.com/â€¦/yojimbo/] }} '''Yojimbo''' is a [[personal information manager]] for [[Mac OS X]] by [[Bare Bones Software]]. It can store notes, images/media, [[Uniform Resource Locator|URL]]s, [[web page]]s. Yojimbo can also encrypt any of its contents and store the password in the [[Apple Keychain|Keychain]]. It is Bare Bones' second [[Cocoa (API)|Cocoa]] application. ==External links== * [http://www.barebones.com/products/yojimbo/ Yojimbo homepage] [[Category:OS X-only software]] [[Category:Personal information managers]] {{mac-software-stub}}
